text.div:
Payee Type

Code Description Comment Version
EMPL Employer A legal entity that controls and directs a worker under an express or implied contract of employment and a salary or wages in compensation. In worker’s compensation cases, the Employer may be the “organization” responsible for paying the healthcare charges for employment related illness or injury. added v2.6
ORG Payee Organization The payee is not a person/individual/being, but an entity commonly identified as an organization. Examples could be a country healthcare payer, or an insurance company responsible for payment. added v2.6
PERS Person A person/individual/being. added v2.6
PPER Pay Person Person/individual/being responsible for payment. added v2.6

name: v2.0557
title: v2 Payee Type
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0557 ( Payee Type)
